src:
Farhat Vs Hotman Setelah Kasus IG Porno Dihentikan
07 Nov 2019, 05:02 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Penyelidikan kasus dugaan penyebaran konten porno di akun Instagram Hotman Paris berakhir. Penyidik Subdit Cyber Ditreskrimsus Polda Metro Jaya akhirnya menghentikan penyelidikan kasus yang dilaporkan oleh Farhat Abbas itu setelah 3 bulan penyelidikan.
Dirangkum detikcom, penyidik Polda Metro Jaya menyatakan tidak ada unsur pidana dalam kasus yang dilaporkan Farhat itu. Kasus itu resmi disetop pada Kamis 31 Oktober 2019 lalu.
"Subdit IV Tipidsiber pada Kamis, 31 Oktober 2019, menerbitkan Surat Ketetapan Penghentian Penyelidikan (SP2LID) atas pelapor Farhat Abbas terkait dugaan tindak pidana menyebarkan video yang bermuatan kesusilaan melalui media elektronik," kata Kabid Humas Polda Metro Jaya Kombes Argo Yuwono kepada detikcom, Rabu (6/11/2019).
"Pertimbangan hukum dikeluarkannya SP2LID dengan alasan belum ditemukan peristiwa pidana," sambung Argo.
Argo juga menyebut pihak pelapor, yakni Farhat Abbas, tidak bisa menunjukkan bukti-bukti yang kuat dalam kasus itu. Pelapor dikatakannya tidak bisa menunjukkan bahwa video porno yang dilaporkan itu bersumber dari akun medsos milik Hotman Paris.
"Alat bukti yang diajukan pelapor atau saksi yang sudah diklarifikasi tidak dapat menunjukkan sumber video berasal dari akun IG resmi Hotman," kata Argo.
text:
Farhat V Hotman After IG Porn Case Stopped
Nov 7 2019, 05:02 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Investigation of a case of alleged spread of pornographic content on Hotman Paris Instagram account ends. Cyber Sub Directorate Ditreskrimsus Polda Metro Jaya finally stopped the investigation of the case reported by Farhat Abbas after 3 months of investigation.
Summarized AFP, investigators from the Jakarta Police said there was no criminal element in the case reported by Farhat. The case was officially stopped on Thursday 31 October 2019.
"Tipidsiber Subdit IV on Thursday, October 31, 2019, issued a Letter of Determination of the Termination of Investigation (SP2LID) to reporter Farhat Abbas related to the alleged crime of spreading videos containing morality through electronic media," Metro Jaya Police Public Relations Commissioner Commissioner Argo Yuwono told AFP on Wednesday. (11/06/2019).
"Legal considerations were issued by SP2LID on the grounds that a crime had not yet been found," continued Argo.
Argo also said the reporting party, namely Farhat Abbas, could not show strong evidence in the case. The reporter said he could not show that the pornographic video reported was sourced from the social media account of Hotman Paris.
"The evidence submitted by the reporter or witness who has been clarified cannot show the source of the video comes from the official IG account of Hotman," Argo said.
